name: Slay The Dragon
description:
Slay the dragon is a 2D turn based RPG, where you must kill the Dragon.

Killing the Dragon must be done quickly as the Dragon is destroying towns around the world from the very start of the game, if the dragon destroys all the towns before the player has slain it, the game is over. As you level up you'll get the chance to upgrade towns, to assist in killing the Dragon sooner and maximizing the player score.

Features:
Random Map generation
Many Towns to visit, buy dice, level up the player and restock.
Combat and non-combat encounters
9 Terrain Types with terrain specific monsters.
6 Playable mini games.

Can you ensure that the Dragon does not win?
